effects.name: Major Resolve
effects.description: Increases Physical and Spell Resistance by 5948.

effects.name: Major Breach
effects.description: Reduces Physical and Spell Resistance by 5948.

effects.name: Minor Breach
effects.description: Reduces Physical and Spell Resistance by 2974.

effects.name: Major Vulnerability
effects.description: Increases damage taken by 10%.

effects.name: Major Protection
effects.description: Reduces damage taken by 10%.

effects.name: Minor Celerity
effects.description: Increases movement speed by 10%.

effects.name: Steed's Blessing
effects.description: Increases out of combat movement speed by 20%.

effects.name: War Mount
effects.description: Reduces mount stamina cost and improves mounted movement.

effects.name: Adept Rider Speed (In Combat)
effects.description: Increases movement speed in combat while wearing Adept Rider.

effects.name: Adept Rider Speed (Out of Combat)
effects.description: Increases movement speed out of combat while wearing Adept Rider.

effects.name: Ring of the Wild Hunt
effects.description: Increases movement speed based on in or out of combat.

effects.name: Mark of the Pariah Scaling
effects.description: Increases Physical and Spell Resistance based on missing health; modeled as a scaling effect for pillar checks.

effects.name: Hardened Armor Shield
effects.description: Applies a damage shield scaling with max health.

effects.name: Reviving Barrier Shield
effects.description: Applies a very large group damage shield.

effects.name: Soul Burst Shield
effects.description: Applies a short-duration personal shield.

effects.name: Green Dragon Blood HoT
effects.description: Self heal over time and recovery bonuses.

effects.name: Barrier HoT
effects.description: Heals group members over time while barrier persists.

effects.name: Resolving Vigor HoT
effects.description: Applies a strong heal over time to you and nearby allies.

effects.name: Bull Netch Resource Buff
effects.description: Provides ongoing resource return and cleanse.

effects.name: Ulfsild's Defensive Proc
effects.description: Represents a conditional defensive proc from Ulfsild's Contingency.

effects.name: Wield Soul Minor Buff
effects.description: Placeholder minor defensive buff applied after using Wield Soul.

effects.name: Ironclad
effects.description: Reduces damage taken from direct damage attacks.
